728908f-a.title: Richmond: Hamilton Avenue - Westervelt Avenue
728908f-a.text:
Hamilton Avenue (extreme left), south side, adjoining
its juncture with Westervelt Avenue, showing the First of
New ~Srighton Baptist Church. The view is eastward from
Westervelt Avenue.
May 2, 1928.
P.L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728908f-a.folder: Hamilton Avenue & Westervelt Avenue, Staten Island, NY
